title: "Artificial Intelligence can guess a person's race with up to 99% accuracy just by looking at their X-rays or other medical scans"
excerpt: "AI can identify a patent's race just by analyzing chest and hand x-rays and mammograms. Scientists found AI can accurately predict a black person with 90% accuracy and even 99% accuracy at times."
